name: Rogue Wave Zones
description: Areas where massive, unpredictable waves occur create dangerous maritime hazards. The unpredictable nature creates constant danger for ships, while the extreme conditions can create unique research opportunities or hide underwater phenomena.
atmosphere: Unpredictable monster waves appear without warning while normal seas suddenly explode into towering walls of water. Thunderous crashes mark the zones as ships avoid these treacherous areas. Maritime danger lurks beneath deceptively calm surfaces. Even experienced sailors fear these supernatural wave formations.
